name: Project 1 (tejasithool)
description: This is a project for my IT 201 class. It is a game that enables you to create a capsule shape when you right-click on the screen. You can manually change the color of the object by either dragging the sliders or selecting a pre-made color from the dropdown. There is a feature that shows the user the position of the mouse and there is also a button that shows the preview of the color.
